questions.question: This popular serial data bus features among other things, tasty "Miso".  What is this bus called?
questions.answer: What is SPI or Serial Peripheral Interface?

questions.question: *Troll Alert* In order to guarantee your submission is posted on Hackaday, your project must include this

questions.question: What is the famous algorithm that allows one to analyze a signal, captured in the time domain, in the frequency Domain?
questions.answer: What is Fourier Transform or FFT (Fast Fourier Transform)?
